mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.kehuxiansuo_name as kehuxiansuoName ,a.kehuxiansuo_phone as kehuxiansuoPhone ,a.kehuxiansuo_id_number as kehuxiansuoIdNumber ,a.kehuxiansuo_photo as kehuxiansuoPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.kehuxiansuo_email as kehuxiansuoEmail ,a.kehuxiansuo_types as kehuxiansuoTypes ,a.kehuxiansuo_content as kehuxiansuoContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail ,yuangong.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM kehuxiansuo a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.kehuxiansuo_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuxiansuoName},'%')
and a.kehuxiansuo_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuxiansuoPhone},'%')
and a.kehuxiansuo_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuxiansuoIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.kehuxiansuo_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuxiansuoEmail},'%')
and a.kehuxiansuo_types = #{params.kehuxiansuoTypes}
and a.kehuxiansuo_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuxiansuoContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
and yuangong.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
